title: She's On The Verge Of Busting Her Husband's Mistress, But *This* Is Holding Her Back
description:
Imagine going through your husband's Facebook messages and finding out that he's been having an affair! Not only is he cheating, but he's cheating with a mutual friend of yours!
How do you handle the situation? Confront both of them or talk to the mistress's husband first?
This is the decision our listener is seeking advice on. Any help?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
